content.data: As opposed to the Body Parameter (below) the Body All Variable displays the main Bid Center View fully expanded.
The Body Variable displays the main Bid Center View on the Report exactly as displayed. In the samples below you can see that if a Line Item is not expanded it will not be expanded in the Report.
Body of Report from Bid Center View #1 above
Body of Report from Bid Center View #2 above

A user defined value representing the Pre-Tax Total price of the Job as calculated by the active Rate Table(s). Simply replace X with a numeric value representing the percentage you would like displayed.

A user defined value representing the Total price of the Job as calculated by the active Rate Table(s). Simply replace X with a numeric value representing the percentage you would like displayed. This is a great value for displaying a Job Deposit for your Customer.
